author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NewSoft Technology unit to issue 2.5 mln shares
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - NewSoft Technology Corp
* Says its unit will issue 2.5 million shares, at the price of T$16 per share, to replenish working capital
* 10 percent of the new shares will be offered to the companyâ€™s employees
* Remaining 90 percent of the new shares will be offered to the existing shareholders, who are eligible to purchase 562.5 shares for every 1,000 shares they hold
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/8RxLQV
